description: MainActivity class for an Android TV application, managing navigation between Home, Video Details, and Player screens, and handling fragment transactions.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity of the Android TV app, extending FragmentActivity, managing fragment navigation for different screens.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and loads the HomeFragment if no saved state exists.

methods.name: openDetails
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with VideoDetailsFragment to show video metadata.

methods.name: playVideo
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with PlayerFragment to start video playback, with optional resume position.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Handles back navigation, either popping the fragment back stack or closing the activity.

methods.name: onBackPressed
methods.description: Overrides default back press to utilize goBack() behavior.
